data.name: WingMan Demo
data.detailed_description:
WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with hotties. Every now and then you will be faced with decisions that will alter the path of your wingman adventure. Hitting on the wrong ladies can cause fights with random guys and bouncers.

As the game progresses you will gain prestige status, which in turn will affect your decision-making. A game map will open up showing clubs from all around the world that you can choose. Tbone will rely on your conversational skills to win the moment.

data.short_description: WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with hotties.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit.
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390X or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: In this point & click adventure game DEMO, your main objective is hanging out with your wingman. The game focuses mostly on dancing with your mouse in a point-and-click fashion. There is no main adultness about the game other than you are hanging out and chasing girls. There is no nudity, no making out. It's really more about conversations with bouncers, bartenders, girls, club owners & cops.
